column1: Local Foods////The Gulf Shrimp and crab sandwich was a little too "mayonnaisey" for me but there was definitely a generous amount of crab and shrimp filling. I was too full to try my best friend's sister's dish
column3: the experience has been a memorable one. Both a feast for my eyes and a party for my tastebuds! Thanks for making local foods
column4: so tasty! I will be back!
